title: Next Hextech Crafting Skin.
body:
I was curious on the next hextech crafting skin as we know SoulStealer Vayne and Hextech Annie have been a huge success with not only the quality of the skin, but  also holds its rarity as well, Does any one know if a Riot member has stated that there will be more coming?  If so when and potentially who?  

As a side Subject the SoulStealer series is already amazing with Vlad and Vayne i cannot wait for you guys to continue the line, Maybe on Zed or Katarina

Cheers in advance and GoodLuck on the Rift.
